Content:
This thread is just a rant about my stumpy legs.

I'm not short at 5' 10" but my 29" inseam means most riding pants don't fit and most bikes outside of cruisers are too tall!

Last weekend I stopped in at a dealership to check out a bunch of bikes and found out that I can barely reach the ground on most.

GSX-8S... Too tall
XSR700... Too tall
MT-07... I could barely do it, but only because the suspension sagged under my weight.
SV650... I can't flat foot it but I can get the ball of my foot down, so it's doable.

I'd say anything with a seat height greater than 31" would be a real struggle, almost to the point of being risky. Lowering would be required.

Title: Having short legs is a massive pain in rear!
Author: Matt8995
